```{r merge, include=FALSE}
project = "nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04"
billing= "nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04"
covid <- "SELECT * FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.covid19Survey_v1_JP`  where Connect_ID is not null"
parts <- "SELECT Connect_ID, token, D_512820379, D_471593703, state_d_934298480, D_230663853,
D_335767902, D_982402227, D_919254129, D_699625233, D_564964481, D_795827569, D_544150384,
D_371067537, D_430551721, D_821247024, D_914594314,  state_d_725929722, d_822499427, d_222161762,
D_949302066 , D_517311251, D_205553981, D_117249500, d_265193023, d_331584571_d_266600170_d_343048998, d_331584571_d_266600170_d_840048338 FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.participants_JP` 
where Connect_ID IS NOT NULL and (D_512820379='486306141' OR D_512820379='854703046') and d_331584571_d_266600170_d_840048338 is not null and d_331584571_d_266600170_d_343048998 is not null and d_220186468='231311385'"


covid_table <- bq_project_query(project, covid, n_max = Inf, page_size = 1000)
parts_table <- bq_project_query(project, parts, n_max = Inf, page_size = 1000)


covid_data <- bq_table_download(covid_table, bigint = "integer64")
parts_data <- bq_table_download(parts_table, bigint = "integer64")


parts_data$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(parts_data$Connect_ID) 
covid_data$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(covid_data$Connect_ID) 


cvd= left_join(covid_data, parts_data, by="Connect_ID")
#dim(cvd)


cat("Particiapnts with COVID Survey Completion: ", dim(cvd)[[1]])
#dim(CVD)

CVD_tib <- as_tibble(cvd)
#dim(CVD_tib)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA)
```

```{r functions, include=FALSE}
gt_functCVD <- function(CID, Title){  
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  dt_select <- CVD_tib %>%  select(Connect_ID, !!CID_SYM)
  gt_yn <- dt_select  %>% group_by(!!CID_SYM) %>% summarize(n=n(), percentage=100*n/nrow(.)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate(answer=dplyr::recode(!!CID_SYM, !!!CVD_dict)) %>% replace_na(list(answer="Skipped this Question")) %>%  select(answer, n, percentage)
  
  gt_yn %>%  gt()  %>%  
  fmt_number(columns = "percentage", decimals = 1) %>% 
  tab_header(title = md(Title)) %>% 
  cols_label(answer = md("**Answer**"), n = md("**Number of Participants**"), percentage = md("**Percentage of Participants**")) %>% 
grand_summary_rows(columns=c(n, percentage),fns = ~sum(.,na.rm = T)) %>% 
  tab_options(
      stub.font.weight = "bold"
    ) %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = answer,
    )
  ) %>% opt_row_striping()
}

hist_funct <- function(CID,Title, Xlab, Ylab) {
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  cvd %>% dplyr::mutate(!!CID_SYM:=as.numeric(!!CID_SYM)) %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!CID_SYM)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=!!CID_SYM))+
     xlab(Xlab) + ylab(Ylab) + geom_histogram()+  ggtitle(Title)+
    geom_histogram(color="black")+ scale_y_continuous(breaks=pretty_breaks()) +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept=mean(!!CID_SYM, na.rm=T)), colour="#2973A5" , linetype="solid")
  
}


date_hist_funct <- function(CID,Title, Xlab, Ylab){
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  covid_sect<- cvd %>% dplyr::mutate(contracted_date2 = case_when(!is.na(!!CID_SYM) ~ paste0(!!CID_SYM, "-01"),
                                                          TRUE ~ NA))
  covid_sect$contracted_date2 <- as.Date(covid_sect$contracted_date2)

  covid_sect %>% 
    mutate(Date = ymd(contracted_date2)) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(contracted_date2)) +
    xlab(Xlab) + ylab(Ylab) + geom_histogram()+  ggtitle(Title)+
    geom_histogram(color="black")+ scale_y_continuous(breaks=pretty_breaks()) +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept=mean(count, na.rm=T)), colour="#2973A5" , linetype="solid")
}
```
